s.text: "Is it true you said of James Barksdale and Marc Andreessen, in an inexplicably British locution, 'I don't ever want to hear that those c**ts earned one sodding shilling off their bloody browser'?"

"Are the ActiveX data objects of a frequency-division multiplexing DDR SDRAM with full duplex VRML granularity hashing and an MVS IA-64 chip concerned with narrow-band, random-access Winsock functionality?"
D. Barnes & Noble's ownership of book distributor Ingram, says Avin Domnitz, head of the American Booksellers Association.
Asked Monday in court by Justice Department attorney David Boies.
